short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extention for scientific data gathering

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Academics Database Integrator is a Chrome extension specifically designed to enhance the experience and efficacy of academic researchers, scholars, and students. This tool integrates the researcher profile with Google Scholar, Erihplus and Web of Sciences databases, offering streamlined access and insightful analytics about researchers and their academic contributions.
